name: I don't like my dreams
description:
"I don't like my dreams" is a fast paced game where you are battling the clock and have no time to waste.

  You'll quickly figure out what you have to do to progress and through trial and error you eventually will move further into the game. 

Explore 2 environments, where you will have to be faster then your enemies and outsmart them in some cases, and a third environment where you can rest.  ;)
